segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: 嘿，爸爸，我能借5万美元吗？
segments.translated_text: "Hey Dad, I know this is a huge favor and it's a lot of money, but I really need to ask if I could borrow $50,000. There's this incredible opportunity that has come up, and it's something I've been working towards for a long time. It's not just important to me—it's potentially life-changing. I believe in this project so much, and I have a solid plan to make it work. I wouldn't ask if I wasn't absolutely sure this could be a game-changer for my future. I promise to be responsible and work hard to make sure everything goes smoothly. Your support would mean the world to me."

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
segments.text: 妈妈需要做肾透析，我们真的没有钱。
segments.translated_text: Mom needs to undergo kidney dialysis, and we really have no money.
